ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC
AND WE'RE BACK! In Fairyland that is. Oh fluff how are we stuck here AGAIN?! A new king calls upon a familiar face to help Gert with a big problem...which is uh Gert.
Eisner Award-winning writer SKOTTIE YOUNG (MIDDLEWEST TWIG THE ME YOU LOVE IN THE DARK) and artist BRETT BEAN (Marvel's Rocket and Groot) return to I HATE FAIRYLAND for the beginning of a brand-new story arc!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 11:56:08. [CVDB996399] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:03:58. [Issue ID 2549117]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brett B Bean,Eric Powell,Jim Mahfood,Peach MoMoKo
ComicInfo.Characters: Larrigon Wentsworth III,King Cloudeus,Thomas,Sir Nimbus,The Moon,Gert
